channel.title: [2,000 Views] ~ (RELEASE) Origin-Scape (Full Screen Base Server) 508 HD
channel.description:
Yes, Sorry it is an Old Server, i decided to do it a long time ago. It was a completly blank base, i coded mostly everything myself (With help from some people :P)
Let's get started.
First of all the download~
http://uppit.com/IWPH6I ~ Server
Use any 508 HD Client :P One in Tonypker13's Tutorial ~ http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327545.0.html http://uppit.com/7SKORQ
About the Server~
This is a complete base for 508 Coders, it contains the basics.
Npc Fighting. Player Fighting.
Specials~
Dragon Mace
Dragon Dagger
Dragon Longsword
Dragon Scimitar
Dragon Claws ~ (Rune Claws with Special...)
Dragon Halberd
Saradomin Sword
Armadyl Godsword
Saradomin Godsword
Bandos Godsword
Zamorak Godsword (Sorry no Barrage...As i said, this was my oldest 508)
Base for Npc Following~
Most of the things have already been added, now all you need to do is add the voids to the NpcPlayerCombat.java.
The one i did, is for Summoning~ Which you need to add :P (Don't worry, i will add it later if you don't want to!)
I've added Wilderness Levels, and the option to attack~ You need to be in a particular level to attack a particular player.
FULL SCREEN INTERFACES~ Obviously this is full screen, you can remove the interfaces, if you'd want to. (TONYPKER13'S tutorial, find and remove those things)
Banking and Noting~ Yes, as i said~ Banking and Noting is almost full (Just need to add the tabs) Unfortunatly you can only bank on 508, without full screen interfaces :( However i assure you it's there!
Items dropped on Death~ Yes, items are dropped on death.
Special Energy Bar~ Restores eventually, after ever 25 seconds or so. Run Energy Bar~ Restores obviously :P
Every single thing you'd need for a 508 Full Screen base server is here, - I will be releasing my NEW 508 Server, Soon, So, i'd understand if you don't like this one. If you don't, then just tell me and i will remove on demand :)
Pictures~
Items Dropped on Death and the Wanna-be Dragon Claws Special :P I suppose you know what to expect with the other specials :)
P.S~ The special only works on Players.
[url=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=16iuq2q&s=5"]Dragon Claws / Item Dropped on Death / Wilderness Levels Video[/url] ~ Broken Link
Fixed~ [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=16iuq2q&s=5] A Video Showing Wilderness Levels and Items Dropped On Death[/url]
Bob's Story~ Why was he always so mean?
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=eqtphj&s=5] Bob Gets To Use Dragon Claws Special[/url]
Watch it in Full Screen :P
Wilderness Levels and Correct Levels to Attack.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/317be9v.jpg[/img]
Will be adding more pictures and videos later.
Enjoy ~ and i understand if you call this "nooby" or "boring" source. because it is a bit *dated*.
[b]This Isn't Something you should judge me on now :P Since i will be releasing my new 508 Origin-DreamPk Server~ Soon[/b]

Make sure you have the Titan Cache.
Make sure you’ve set it to Resizeable.
Type a Username and Password.

Originalpker~
